stocks.name: NVIDIA
stocks.reason: Uncontested AI infrastructure leader. $660B capex program confirms long-term commitment. Every major AI player depends on their GPUs. Pricing power is immense.

fundamentals.catalyst: AI spending acceleration, data center buildout

stocks.name: Microsoft
stocks.reason: Big Tech earnings winner this season. OpenAI partnership paying dividends. Azure capturing enterprise AI workloads. Office 365 + Copilot integration creates new revenue stream.

fundamentals.catalyst: Enterprise AI adoption, cloud margins expanding

stocks.name: Super Micro Computer
stocks.reason: AI hardware infrastructure play. Server/switch demand exploding as data centers scale. Benefits from NVIDIA demand without being subject to same geopolitical scrutiny. Emerging from accounting issues with strong execution.

fundamentals.catalyst: Data center capex acceleration, supply chain partnerships

stocks.name: Pure Storage
stocks.reason: Enterprise storage for AI workloads. High-margin SaaS business model. Data creation from AI = storage demand explosion. Stable revenue, expanding margins.

fundamentals.catalyst: AI data storage growth, enterprise migration to cloud

stocks.name: Coinbase
stocks.reason: Crypto market infrastructure leader. BTC/ETH strength supports retail and institutional on-ramps. Regulatory clarity improving (Trump administration). Earnings growing with crypto prices. Lower correlation to stocks.

fundamentals.catalyst: Crypto bull market, regulatory tailwinds, spot ETF inflows

history.reasoning: Initial balanced portfolio with AI exposure and safety

history.action: Strategic portfolio revision - AI infrastructure focus
history.reasoning: Thesis: AI infrastructure buildout (SMCI servers) + storage for AI data (PSTG) + AI cloud leaders (NVDA, MSFT) + crypto as alternative inflation hedge and sector momentum play (COIN). All 5 have >8.2 strength with clear catalysts.
